model_answer: The answer is C: [00:05:50 - 00:06:13]. The audio mentions that an Italian study showed people were twice as likely to give a cigarette when addressed in their right ear, and this information is presented on screen from 00:05:50 to 00:06:13.

The narration recounts the famous 1973 ‘rickety bridge’ experiment in option B: [00:02:39 - 00:02:48]. The audio mentions that this experiment was conducted by psychologist Daniel Kahneman and his colleague Amos Tversky, who found that men on a shaky bridge wrote more sexually suggestive stories and were more likely to call the experimenter back than men on a stable bridge.
